column1:
“ i hate donald trump . he’s the worst president ever . “ 
•
“ oh Donald Trump is going to send everyone ( who isn’t in a high class rank ) a 1000 dollar check to help bc of the coronavirus stopping ppl from working ? i love him! he’s the best “

some of you ppl make me so angry
